name: ROGUE
description: Win a game in Roguelike mode

name: EXTREME_ROGUE
description: Win a game in Roguelike mode on Extreme difficulty

name: NIGHTMARE_ROGUE
description: Win a game in Roguelike mode on Nightmare difficulty

name: ROGUE_FIGHTER
description: Win a player-vs-player game in Rogue-Like mode

name: ARMY_STOPPER
description: Win a game in Stop the Army mode

name: EXTREME_ARMY_STOPPER
description: Win a game in Stop the Army mode on Extreme difficulty

name: NIGTHMARE_ARMY_STOPPER
description: Win a game in Stop the Army mode on Nightmare difficulty

name: CO_OP_ARMY_STOPPER
description: Win a co-op game in Stop the Army mode

name: KING_HUNTER
description: Win a player-vs-player game in King Hunt mode

name: MONSTER_HUNTER
description: Win a game in Monster Hunt mode

name: IMPERIAL_DIPLOMAT
description: Win a game in Imperial Conquest mode

name: IMPERIAL_AMBASSADOR
description: Win a game in Imperial Conquest mode on Extreme difficulty

name: GOBLIN_WARCHIEF
description: Win a game playing as the goblin leader Morgoth and the Daughters

name: UNDEAD_SUMMONER
description: Win a game playing as the undead leader Darkness Dominion

name: PUMPKIN_OVERLORD
description: Win a game playing as the pumpkin leader Nature Nurturists

name: TRUE_LEADER
description: Unlock all the leaders

name: TRUE_EMPEROR
description: Win 2 times with each leader

name: IT_IS_NOT_THAT_BAD
description: Lose at least once in each game mode

name: FLEXIBLE_SKILLS
description: Win 5 times in each game mode

name: PRODIGY
description: Get 5 times more wins than losses on extreme difficulty (considering all game modes except Imperial Conflict). Or win a total of 55 games.

name: SUPER_PRODIGY
description: Get 5 times more wins than losses on nightmare difficulty (considering all game modes except Imperial Conflict). Or win a total of 111 games.

name: ULTRA_GIGA_PRODIGY
description: Get 3 times more wins than losses on impossible difficulty (considering all game modes except Imperial Conflict). Or win a total of 222 games.

name: ACHIEVER_OF_THE_IMPOSSIBLE
description: Win a Full Conquest on Impossible difficulty level at least once.

name: FOOD_GRABBER
description: Bring 50 food to a storehouse in a single trip of any worker

name: FOOD_HAULER
description: Bring 150 food to a storehouse in a single trip of any worker

name: FOOD_HOARDER
description: Bring 250 food to a storehouse in a single trip of any worker

name: RIVERS_OF_GOLD
description: Bring 2500 gold to a storehouse in a single trip of any worker

name: FEED_THE_FISH
description: Create a lake with 100 fish

name: WEEKLY_BONUS
description: Get a bonus level on a unit after levelling it to maximum regular level

name: MONTHLY_BONUS
description: Get 3 bonus levels on a unit after levelling to maximum regular level

name: YEARLY_BONUS
description: Get 10 bonus levels on a unit after levelling it to a maximum regular level

name: LEGENDARY_HARVESTER
description: Have a legendary harvester with 1500 resources harvested (or generated if it's e.g a bank)

name: SUPER_LEGENDARY_HARVESTER
description: Have a legendary harvester with 10 000 resources harvested

name: LEGENDARY_HEALER
description: Have a legendary healer with a total 3000 points of healing done

name: SUPER_LEGENDARY_HEALER
description: Have a legendary healer with a total 10 000 points of healing done

name: REFORESTATION
description: Have a forester that has spawned 20 trees

name: BACK_TO_ROOTS
description: Have 48 Foresters

name: LEGENDARY_SPELLCASTER
description: Have any type of spell caster that has casted their spell 500 times

name: SUPER_LEGENDARY_SPELLCASTER
description: Have any type of spell caster that has casted their spell 1000 times
